name: Green Curry Cod
author: CHEDDAR88
summary: This recipe is a mildly hot fish curry, which is delicious when accompanied by a fresh green salad, rice, and crusty bread.
ingredients: 1 medium green bell pepper, thinly sliced
directions: Preheat oven to 375  degrees F (190 degrees C)
In a saucepan over medium-low heat, mix the coconut cream, curry sauce, dill, salt, and pepper
Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat, and cook the pepper, onion, leek, and garlic about 5 minutes
Place the cod in a baking dish
Cover with the vegetables, and top with the coconut cream mixture
Bake 30 minutes in the preheated oven, stirring sauce and vegetables occasionally, until fish is easily flaked with a fork
